name: Tamago Delivery Service
description:
Tamago Delivery Service is a rage-inducing physics platformer, where you play as Tori the Delivery Bird, and must deliver eggs to their nest! The game was made in 18 hours for the GMTK Game Jam, to the theme of 'Joined Together'.

Embark on a flight across three cute and colourful levels, without letting your precious eggs smash into the floor. But a bird has no hands, so how are you meant to deliver eggs across the city? A rope! Your trusty delivery rope connects you and your eggs, and you can drag them along as you soar through the skies.

Slow and steady wins the race, though, as going too fast will result in your parcels becoming an egg-y stain on the pavement.

Controls:

A/D or L/R Arrows - Move Left / Right

Space (Press) - Jump

Space (Hold) - Glide

Escape/P - Pause

Music Credits:

https://opengameart.org/content/happy-synths-loop-with-slight-christmas-feeling
